Reviews.Title: The Mac Book alternative
Reviews.Author: David A W
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I wanted - MS operating system light weight, fast long battery life, size just right - make sure you get Win 8

Reviews.Title: Good and bad
Reviews.Author: taghi Naghi
Reviews.Content: Pro- the cooling fan is not underneath so you can put it over your laps without it gets hot.Con- you cannot insert two USB ram drive same time because the USB ports are very close to each other and there is not enough space between them so that two drives inserted same time.Pro- light, handy and fastCon- a pop up window asking you to register all the time comes up and makes you crazy. You cannot deny registration and if you want to go ahead and do that you then encounter a membership not registration that is then requesting information from you that are not their business to ask which specially when you notice the headquaeter is in Taiwan and these information collected are sent to them!But there is nothing you could do other than giving them some fake information.
